availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. Pinner (Lyon County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, physician. Tennessee native. Married to Letitia Catlett Pinner in 1860. Father of F. S. Pinner and S. Belle Pinner. Physician in Stewart County, Tennessee, in 1850. Physician in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Lyon County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Stewart County, p. 463B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 760.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 41A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lyon County, KY, June 1863, p. 14.
Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970, National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Louisville, KY, National 44543, State 543.
E.S. Gaillard, ed., The Richmond and Louisville Medical Journal, vol. XXI (Louisville, KY: Medical Journal Book and Job Steam Printing House, 1876), 485-486.
"William Wyche Pinner (c1826-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 67145041, accessed December 6, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67145041.
